CustomField.description: This field identifies how Done can be marked for the Tile. It can have multiple fields and multiple files combined with " AND "
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For e.g. FIELD:Fellow_Training_Confirmation__c AND FILE:Workplan. Possible values for FILE are Workplan, Photo, PhotoReleaseForm, PhotoOnsite, Completed Activities Report, RemainingDeliverables. Supported Field are from CC Engagement object only.
CustomField.label: Done Condition
